Crimes.Crime_Name: False or misleading information in passport application
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Adequacy of reasons for administrative decision
Crimes.Legal_Provision: s. 10(2)(b) of the Canadian Passport Order
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Lack of conviction for an indictable offense
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to establish jurisdiction without conviction
Crimes.Review_Outcome: Decision set aside, remitted for reconsideration
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Lack of analysis on consent or use of document
Crimes.Application_Factor: Presence of criminal conviction as precondition
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Unreasonable decision due to inadequate reasoning
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Alleged false statements and possession of another’s passport
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: No charges or conviction despite alleged misconduct
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge based on jurisdiction and procedural fairness
Crimes.Jurisdictional_Focus: Federal administrative law and passport issuance
Crimes.Relevant_Law: Canadian Passport Order, administrative law principles
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to analyze key facts (e.g., consent)
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility: Alleged false statements and unauthorized possession of ID

Crimes.Crime_Name: Possession of identity document without lawful excuse
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Adequacy of reasons for administrative decision
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Alleged unlawful possession of another’s passport
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Implied under general identity fraud provisions
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Possession of another’s identity document without lawful excuse
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Lack of analysis on consent or intent
Crimes.Review_Outcome: Decision set aside, remitted for reconsideration
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Failure to assess whether possession was with consent
Crimes.Application_Factor: Use of passport in commission of offense
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Unreasonable decision due to inadequate reasoning
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Principles of administrative law on reasoned decisions
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Alleged possession of another’s identity document without lawful excuse
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: No analysis of consent or purpose of possession
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Failure to provide transparent and logical reasoning
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Unauthorized possession of official identity document
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Disputed justification for possessing another’s passport
Crimes.Jurisdictional_Focus: Federal administrative law and passport eligibility
Crimes.Relevant_Law: Canadian administrative law, Canadian Passport Order
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to address central factual issues
Crimes.Grounds_for_Inadmissibility: Alleged unlawful possession of identity document
